app_description: Fast, secure messaging built for privacy and real conversations.
privacy_policy: By tapping “Get Started”, you agree to our Terms of Service and  Privacy Policy.
login_subtitle: Register with LUQYA and connect with your friends and family.
login_privacy: by entering your phone number, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
verify_subtitle: We glad to have you with us on luqya app
luqya_title_policy: At Luqya, we value your trust more than your data. Here is how we protect you.
luqya_expire_message: To keep your digital footprint light, all messages are automatically wiped from our systems after 7 days.
luqya_permission_description: Used only when you choose to share photos or take profile pictures. We never access your files without your permission.
luqya_permission_microphone_description: Required for sending voice notes. Audio is only captured while you are actively recording.
luqya_permission_notification_descriptio: Used to alert you of new messages. You can customize these at any time in your system settings.
luqya_commitment_description: AtLuqya does not sell your data to third parties. We are built by a developer who believes privacy is a right, not a feature. Your conversations are your business—not ours. Luqya, we value your trust more than your data. Here is how we protect you.
about_luqya_mission_text: Luqya was born out of a desire to simplify digital communication. In an oasis of privacy, we focus on speed and a beautiful user experience,bridging the gap between distance and intimacy.
about_luqya_JD_text2: A craftsman of code dedicated to solving complex problems with simple solutions.
about_luqya_JD_text3: As the developer behind Luqya, I believe that great software should be invisible—it should just work, allowing you to focus on what matters most: your conversations. Every line of code is written to ensure your digital life feels at home.
contact_luqya_title: Have a question or feedback about Luqya? I'm here to help you.
contact_luqya_support_title: For technical issues, bug reports, or feature suggestions, reach out directly to the Luqya team.
contact_luqya_response: I personally review every piece of feedback to make Luqya the best experience for you.
langauge_title: Choose your preferred language for Luqya
